title: (x) Two serif faces used on Typophile - H&FJ Mercury, Georgia {Lari}
content:
Curiously what these fonts name is? Thx

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [untitled.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20070306145124/http:/typophile.com/files/untitled_0.JPG) | 10.55 KB |

author: abiel

comments.content: The first one is H&FJ Mercury, the other one could be Georgia, it’s hard to say on a mac.

![](http://web.archive.org/files/text_4627.jpg)
  
the another one is georgia for sure.  
\>We can always Increase the text size in the browser.
Man, how didn’t I realise where this was from?
